title: Thunderbird not displaying a Microsoft 365 login display window for SMTP, so user can't send emails
content:
I just installed Thunderbird for use on a user profile on a windows server 2008 r2. The account is a 365 outlook account. When I set it up, everything was failing. I then set up the user without a password, and had Thunderbird automatically prompt me with a 365 user login screen when pressing get mail. This worked to log in to get the mail, but it didn't update any smtp settings, and as far as I can tell, there's no way to tickle the system into displaying one. Has anyone experienced this, and what did you find that worked?

Gracias in advance.

title: problemi nella visualizzazione delle mail con thunderbird - modalità cartelle unificate delle varie mail gestite
content: Buongiorno, utilizzo mail thunderbird come programma per la gestione della posta elettronica. Ho varie caselle mail, personali, aprendo il programma , nella modalità "cartelle unificate", vedo tutte la mail (indipendentemente dalla casella cui fanno riferimento). da circa 1 mese, quando apro tale programma, se lascio in modalità "cartelle unificate" non vedo più alcuna mail, ovvero vedo solo i simboli su cadauna riga. per visionare le mail, apro tale cartella e mi compaiono a cascata i vari indirizzi mail personali. Scarica regolarmente la posta, il problema è che devo selezionare ogni account di posta per vederla, uscendo quindi dalla modalità "cartelle unificate". Come posso risolvere tale problema? Vi è qualche comando/modifica da fare? E' un mese circa che compare sto problema, mai in passato si è verificato . altresì non ho apportato modifiche ovvero non ho aggiunto mail o altro. Grazie per l'aiuto. walter
creator: albertiwalterpietro

title: Address Book
content:
I send out Newsletters and, to spread the load, I have six separate sub Address Books. I now find I cannot add a new address to one/any of them.

I select the address book, click New Contact, fill in the details and click Save. The new address appears in my Personal Address Book, but not where I want it.

Any ideas please?
creator: Beac0n

title: problemi visualizzazione mail su "posta in arrivo" - cartelle "unificate"
content: Utilizzo per la gestione mail il programma thunderbird; ho varie mail impostate, tutte consultate dal sottoscritto. Ho scelto l'opzione "cartelle unificate" in maniera da visualizzare tutte le mail di posta in arrivo sullo schermo. Se clicco sul menù "posta in arrivo", si aprono tutti gli account in sequenza. La procedura invia/ricevi è funzionante, regolarmente. Da un mese circa, lasciando l'opzione cartelle unificate non si vedono le @-mail : per visualizzare le mail pervenute, devo cliccare su ciascun account (a fianco del quale compare il numero mail nuove da visionare). Allego uno screenshot della schermata thunderbird. preciso che non sono stati aggiunti account o modifiche. Ho provveduto altresì a scaricare in cartelle esterne le @-mail , pensando che tale problematica fosse legata all'eccessivo numero di mail presenti. Nulla è cambiato, non viene visualizzata alcuna mail.
creator: albertiwalterpietro

title: Thunderbird and email viruses
content:
I am trying to upload some emails via Thunderbird into an IMAP mailbox. I'm having to do this in 2 steps as they are stored in an MBOX file Step 1 is to load them all into a local folder in Thunderbird - no problems there, all 2279 emails load Step 2 is to copy them folder in IMAP mailbox. However, many of them disappear. They are all phishing emails and I believe some (or all) of those that disappear have viruses with them - however, I need to keep them for testing. I can't find anywhere in Thunderbird where they may be being scanned.

I'm running Thunderbird in a Linux VM on a Windows machine. I've excluded the directory where the VM is stored from checking by my AV software. I've also (just in case) disabled my AV software entirely, but this hasn't made any difference.

I've found where Thunderbird scans for phishing emails and turned that off. I can't find anything in Thunderbird that scans for viruses, or if it does what happens to them.

Any help would be appreciated. Thanks
creator: trevorwood

title: Make non-Automatic Threading an option!
content: Can you make an option to turn OFF automatic threading? This makes it impossible for me to find past emails by date, which has greatly hindered my personal and professional communications. Or can you tell me how to go back to an older version of Thunderbird which doesn't have auto-threading? Please tell your developers I've LOVED and recommended Thunderbird for years, but will LEAVE if I don't have the ability to sort past emails by date alone.
creator: vlynn

title: Unable to send emails "Outgoing server failed'
content:
When I try to send emails an error message pops up stating: "Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.cwsswater.ca failed. The server may be unavailable or is refusing SMTP connections. Please verify that your Outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again."

My server name is smtp.cwsswater.ca, using port 587, connection security is set to none, and authentication method is password, transmitted securely. I've checked my firewall and that wasn't the issue. I'm at a loss on how to fix this issue. Any help is appreciated.
creator: steve500

title: Undo "Ignore Thread" is not working
content: I have a message that is marked "Ignore". It's a single message, not part of a thread. When right-clicking on the message header if "Ignore Thread" is ticked or unticked makes no difference, and the red circle icon remains : removing the tick by "View" -> "Threads" -> "Ignored Threads" always means the message disappears. I've tried using "k" to undo the "ignore" - that doesn't work either. I can't work out how to undo the "ignore" for this message, meaning I always have to have viewing ticked for ignore threads, which I don't want. How do I undo the ignore on this message?
creator: pamelap1

title: All my contacts are blank from carddav and no visible entries from caldav
content:
Hi - I've been trying to set up caldav and carddav ever since I deployed my iredmail server with sogo installed. I notice on my phone and through the sogo interface I can save cards, save calendar items, etc and observe them with no issues. On thunderbird windows 10 x64 102.7.0 (and earlier) I've not been able to see any items from caldav or carddav - even though the app seems to be aware of the connections and isn't complaining. For instance, I added a calendar item in thunderbird for a caldav acct and see the item in my phone, but not on my thunderbird calendar. Also, I see cards exist in my carddav acct in thunderbird, but the data is all blank. photo attached. I've triple checked the config, and everything looks good. Any ideas on where I should diagnose this further?

Thanks
creator: craig92

title: Using MacOS 12.6.1 + Thunderbird 102.6.1, emails do not auto-complete

Then, when I close the sent email's window, I get another message about to quit or not to quit (see attached); and finally, when I quit T-Bird, I get a 3rd message that the sent message was not saved and do I want to save it? (see attached). Note: T-Bird is connected with my gmail account.
creator: bittersweet47

title: Some empty mail folders after Thunderbird migration.
content:
I've migrated Thunderbird profile with lot of local folders to a new Windows computer, and almost everything works fine. However, few folders are shown empty in Thunderbird, and they certainly have some mail - I can see it in the corresponding files. When I look at a problematic folder properties it shows that its location is different from the actual file - some random 8 letters, and Thunderbird created an empty folder with this name. I've tried to remove folderTree.json, folderCache.json, and even global-messages-db.sqlite, and restarted the Thunderbird. The properties of the folder remain the same and the directory with wrong name is created again, and the folder remains empty. Other mail folders are fine - the emails are rescanned.

Where the mapping from local mail file name to Properties/Location is stored? I cannot find it with grep - the only reference I've found was in the files I removed, but the mapping somehow persists.
creator: venco5
